Notes on quarks.

Media objects can also be nested (a media object inside a media object):


  1. Quarks

    An atomic model of three fundamental forces and their interaction with four classifications of particles.

    1. Up Quark

      Charge - (+)2/3

    2. Down Quark

      Charge - (-)1/3

    3. Charm Quark

      Charge - (+)2/3

    4. Strange Quark

      Charge - (-)1/3

      5. Top Quark

      Charge - (+)2/3

      Mass - 172,000 MeV

      Decay -> Bottom Quark + W Boson

    2. Bottom Quark

    Charge - (-)1/3

    Anti-Quark

    With quarks join with anit-quarks, they make Mesons.

    Mesons

    Pi Meson (0,+/-)
